mapper.sql: if(a.assess_id IS NULL,r1.report_registration_id ,a.assess_id) AS "assessId", if(a.complaint_main_id IS NULL,r1.complaint_main_id,a.complaint_main_id ) AS "complaintMainId", a.appraiser AS "appraiser", a.assess_time AS "assessTime", a.assess_grade AS "assessGrade", a.assess_content AS "assessContent", a.handle_people AS "handlePeople", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.handle_time AS "handleTime", a.next_link AS "nextLink", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.next_link_man AS "nextLinkMan", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u3.name AS "user.name", b.case_number AS "complaintMain.caseNumber", b.patient_name AS "complaintMain.patientName", b.patient_sex AS "complaintMain.patientSex", b.patient_age AS "complaintMain.patientAge", b.patient_card AS "complaintMain.patientCard", b.involve_hospital AS "complaintMain.involveHospital", b.hospital_level AS "complaintMain.hospitalLevel", b.hospital_grade AS "complaintMain.hospitalGrade", b.involve_department AS "complaintMain.involveDepartment", b.involve_employee AS "complaintMain.involveEmployee", b.proc_ins_id AS "complaintMain.procInsId", o.name AS "complaintMain.hospital.name", o1.name AS "complaintMain.department.name", u1.name AS "complaintMain.employee.name", u2.name AS "linkEmployee.name", t.ID_ AS "complaintMain.act.taskId", r1.report_emp AS "reportRegistration.reportEmp", r1.dispute_time AS "reportRegistration.disputeTime", r1.patient_mobile AS "reportRegistration.patientMobile", sa.name AS "area.name", au.policy_number AS "auditAcceptance.policyNumber"

LEFT JOIN ASSESS_INFO a ON a.complaint_main_id = b.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u3 ON u3.id = a.appraiser -- LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u13 ON u13.id = a.next_link_man LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o on o.id=b.involve_hospital LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o1 ON o1.id=b.involve_department LEFT JOIN SYS_AREA sa ON sa.id=o.area_id LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u1 ON u1.id=b.involve_employee LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u2 ON u2.id=a.next_link_man LEFT JOIN AUDIT_ACCEPTANCE au on b.complaint_main_id = au.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN REPORT_REGISTRATION r1 ON b.complaint_main_id=r1.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_TASK t on t.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INS_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSESS_INFO( assess_id, complaint_main_id, appraiser, assess_time, assess_grade, assess_content, handle_people, create_by, create_date, handle_time, next_link, update_by, next_link_man, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{assessId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{appraiser}, #{assessTime}, #{assessGrade}, #{assessContent}, #{handlePeople}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{handleTime}, #{nextLink}, #{updateBy.id}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ASSESS_INFO SET appraiser = #{appraiser}, assess_time = #{assessTime}, assess_grade = #{assessGrade}, assess_content = #{assessContent}, handle_time = #{handleTime}, next_link = #{nextLink}, next_link_man = #{nextLinkMan} WHERE assess_id = #{assessId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.complaint_main_detail_id AS "tsjd", r.report_registration_id AS "badj", d.audit_acceptance_id AS "shsl", e.investigate_evidence_id AS "dcqz", f.mediate_evidence_id AS "zztj", g.assess_apply_id AS "pgjdsq", h.assess_audit_id AS "pgjdsp", i.assess_appraisal_id AS "pgjd", j.reach_mediate_id AS "dctj", k.sign_agreement_id AS "qsxy", l.perform_agreement_id AS "lxxy", su.summary_id AS "jazj" FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN a LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL b on a.complaint_main_id=b.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN REPORT_REGISTRATION r on r.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN AUDIT_ACCEPTANCE d on d.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN INVESTIGATE_EVIDENCE e on e.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id AND e.investigate_type='1' LEFT JOIN MEDIATE_EVIDENCE f on f.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN ASSESS_APPLY g on g.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN ASSESS_AUDIT h on h.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN ASSESS_APPRAISAL i on i.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN REACH_MEDIATE j on j.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SIGN_AGREEMENT k on k.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN PERFORM_AGREEMENT l on l.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SUMMARY_INFO su on su.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id WHERE a.complaint_main_id = #{complaintMainId}
